Key Match Events: Mohammed Shami took 4/22 and Jasprit Bumrah bagged 3/32 to wrap up a convincing victory
Rohit Sharma’s excellent 87 was the key performance with the bat on the day
England lost all ten wickets for just 99 runs in a dispiriting display
Mohammed Shami cleaned up Rashid and a trademark Bumrah yorker accounted for Mark Wood to seal the win
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma expressed pride in the team's resilience after a close win
India’s sixth consecutive win sends them top of the table, two points clear of South Africa in second
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rain interrupted play, reducing the game to 20 overs per side
India’s pacers Jasprit Bumrah and Mohammed Shami ripped through the England top-order in Lucknow
